author: Markus
content:
Oh, I definitely hold my breath on that election day. 

Whenever passing through Austria, my daughters were astonished about these xenophobic slogans of the FPÃ–. I fully agree, this party is doing the whole society a severe disservice (as the AFD does in Germany) by eroding democratic rules and legitimations, abusing language and making racial and racist wording acceptable by the masses. Dark times.
